headline.main: High Rate of Problem Drinking Reported Among Lawyers

keywords.value: National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: One in three practicing lawyers are problem drinkers, and 28 percent suffer from depression, according to a study of nearly 13,000 licensed lawyers in the United States.
lead_paragraph: One in three practicing lawyers are problem drinkers, and 28 percent suffer from depression, according to a study of nearly 13,000 licensed lawyers in the United States.
